https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hBLJzYriF9zZAHc2Gjb3KTQGTGT.jpg When the trainee pilot and her mortally wounded gunner are shot down, they crash land on a nearby planet. An enemy craft offers the chance of spare parts to fix her ship, but then she spots another survivor - an enemy alien soldier with no intention of letting her escape. Dune Drifter
